plugins.name: Slack
plugins.description: Get real-time notifications about AI model updates, risk assessments, and compliance changes directly in your Slack workspace.
plugins.longDescription: Slack integration enables your team to receive real-time notifications about critical events in VerifyWise. Configure notification routing to send different types of alerts to specific channels, ensuring your team stays informed about AI governance activities, policy changes, risk assessments, and compliance updates.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Real-time Notifications
features.description: Receive instant alerts about critical events in your workspace

features.name: Channel Routing
features.description: Route different notification types to specific channels

features.name: OAuth Integration
features.description: Secure authentication with Slack workspace

features.name: Policy Reminders
features.description: Automated reminders for policy reviews and updates

plugins.name: MLflow
plugins.description: Track and manage machine learning experiments, models, and deployments with comprehensive ML lifecycle management.
plugins.longDescription: MLflow integration connects VerifyWise with your MLflow tracking server, enabling automatic synchronization of ML models and experiments. Track model versions, monitor training metrics, and maintain a comprehensive inventory of all ML models used in your AI systems for compliance and governance purposes.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Model Tracking
features.description: Automatically sync ML models from your MLflow server

features.name: Experiment Management
features.description: Track experiments and training runs

features.name: Version Control
features.description: Maintain model version history and lineage

features.name: Metrics Monitoring
features.description: Monitor model performance metrics and parameters

features.name: Scheduled Sync
features.description: Hourly automated synchronization of models

plugins.name: Azure AI Foundry
plugins.description: Import and manage AI model deployments from Microsoft Azure AI Foundry.
plugins.longDescription: Azure AI Foundry integration enables automatic synchronization of AI model deployments from your Azure subscription. Track deployed models including GPT-4, GPT-3.5, embeddings, and other Azure OpenAI or custom models. Monitor deployment status, SKU capacity, rate limits, and maintain a comprehensive inventory of all AI models for compliance and governance purposes.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Model Import
features.description: Automatically sync AI model deployments from Azure AI Foundry

features.name: Deployment Tracking
features.description: Track deployment status, SKU, and capacity

features.name: Rate Limit Monitoring
features.description: Monitor API rate limits and quotas

features.name: Multi-Model Support
features.description: Support for GPT-4, GPT-3.5, embeddings, DeepSeek, and more

features.name: Manual Sync
features.description: On-demand synchronization of model deployments

plugins.name: Risk Import
plugins.description: Import risks from Excel files for bulk risk creation and management.
plugins.longDescription: Risk Import plugin enables bulk import of risks from Excel files with dropdown data validation. Download a pre-formatted Excel template with dropdown menus for enum fields, fill it with your risk data using the convenient dropdowns, and upload to create multiple risks at once. Features comprehensive validation, detailed error reporting, and support for all risk fields including lifecycle phases, severity levels, and mitigation plans.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Excel Template Download
features.description: Download pre-formatted Excel template with dropdown validation

features.name: Dropdown Data Validation
features.description: Built-in dropdown menus for enum fields in Excel

features.name: Bulk Import
features.description: Upload Excel to create multiple risks at once

features.name: Field Validation
features.description: Comprehensive validation before import

features.name: Import Results
features.description: Detailed feedback on successful and failed imports

plugins.name: Jira Assets Integration
plugins.description: Import AI Systems from Jira Service Management Assets as use-cases.
plugins.longDescription: Jira Assets Integration connects VerifyWise with your JSM Assets (formerly Insight) to import AI System objects as use-cases. Supports organizational and non-organizational classification, automatic scheduled sync, and stores all JIRA attributes as-is. Import AI Systems with a few clicks and keep them in sync with your JIRA data.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Import AI Systems
features.description: Import AI System objects from JSM Assets as use-cases

features.name: Organizational Support
features.description: Classify imports as organizational or non-organizational

features.name: Automatic Sync
features.description: Scheduled synchronization to keep data in sync

features.name: Full Attribute Storage
features.description: All JIRA attributes stored as-is without field mapping

features.name: UC-ID Generation
features.description: Auto-generated unique UC-IDs for imported use-cases

plugins.name: SOC 2 Type II
plugins.description: SOC 2 Type II compliance framework based on Trust Service Criteria.
plugins.longDescription: SOC 2 Type II framework plugin provides comprehensive Trust Service Criteria (TSC) compliance management. Includes all five trust service categories: Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, and Privacy. Auto-imports the complete framework on installation with full feature support including evidence management, risk linking, and progress tracking.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Trust Service Criteria
features.description: Complete TSC coverage: Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, Privacy

features.name: Auto-Import
features.description: Framework automatically imported on plugin installation

features.name: Evidence Management
features.description: Upload and link evidence files to controls

features.name: Risk Linking
features.description: Link controls to identified risks

plugins.description: General Data Protection Regulation compliance framework for EU data protection.
plugins.longDescription: GDPR compliance framework plugin provides comprehensive coverage of EU General Data Protection Regulation requirements. Includes ICT risk management, incident reporting, digital operational resilience testing, and third-party risk management.

plugins.name: ALTAI - Assessment List for Trustworthy AI
plugins.description: EU Commission's Assessment List for Trustworthy Artificial Intelligence based on the Ethics Guidelines for Trustworthy AI.
plugins.longDescription: ALTAI (Assessment List for Trustworthy AI) is a practical tool developed by the High-Level Expert Group on AI for the European Commission. It helps organizations self-assess their AI systems against the seven key requirements for Trustworthy AI: Human Agency and Oversight, Technical Robustness and Safety, Privacy and Data Governance, Transparency, Diversity and Non-discrimination, Societal Well-being, and Accountability.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: 7 Key Requirements
features.description: Complete coverage of all Trustworthy AI requirements

features.name: Self-Assessment
features.description: Practical assessment questions for each requirement

features.name: Auto-Import
features.description: Framework automatically imported on plugin installation

features.name: Evidence Tracking
features.description: Track evidence and documentation for compliance

plugins.name: NIST Cybersecurity Framework
plugins.description: NIST Cybersecurity Framework for managing and reducing cybersecurity risk.
plugins.longDescription: NIST Cybersecurity Framework plugin provides the five core functions: Identify, Protect, Detect, Respond, and Recover. Widely adopted framework for improving critical infrastructure cybersecurity with flexible implementation tiers.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Five Core Functions
features.description: Identify, Protect, Detect, Respond, Recover

plugins.name: FTC AI Guidelines
plugins.description: US Federal Trade Commission guidelines for responsible AI use, covering truth in advertising, fairness, transparency, and consumer protection.
plugins.longDescription: The FTC AI Guidelines framework helps organizations comply with Federal Trade Commission requirements for artificial intelligence. It covers truth in AI advertising, algorithmic fairness and non-discrimination, data privacy, transparency, accountability, consumer rights, and AI in marketing practices. Based on FTC enforcement priorities and guidance documents.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

plugins.name: NYC Local Law 144
plugins.description: New York City Local Law 144 compliance framework for automated employment decision tools (AEDTs) requiring bias audits and candidate notifications.
plugins.longDescription: NYC Local Law 144, effective July 5, 2023, regulates the use of automated employment decision tools (AEDTs) in hiring and promotion decisions. This framework covers AEDT identification, annual bias audit requirements, public disclosure of audit results, candidate notice requirements, data privacy, vendor management, and governance structures.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Bias Audit Compliance
features.description: Annual independent bias audit requirements

features.name: Candidate Notices
features.description: Required notices 10 days before AEDT use

features.name: Public Disclosure
features.description: Website publication of audit results

features.description: Framework automatically imported on plugin installation

plugins.longDescription: CIS Controls v8 plugin provides the 18 critical security controls developed by the Center for Internet Security. Prioritized set of actions to protect organizations and data from known cyber attack vectors with implementation groups for different maturity levels.

plugins.name: OECD AI Principles
plugins.description: OECD Principles on Artificial Intelligence for responsible stewardship of trustworthy AI that respects human rights and democratic values.
plugins.longDescription: The OECD Principles on Artificial Intelligence, adopted in May 2019, were the first intergovernmental standard on AI. Endorsed by G20 leaders, this framework covers inclusive growth and sustainable development, human-centred values and fairness, transparency and explainability, robustness and safety, accountability, and stakeholder engagement.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: G20 Endorsed
features.description: First intergovernmental AI standard endorsed by G20

features.name: Five Core Principles
features.description: Growth, Fairness, Transparency, Safety, Accountability

features.name: Human-Centred AI
features.description: Focus on human rights and democratic values

features.description: Framework automatically imported on plugin installation

plugins.name: Quebec Law 25 (Bill 64)
plugins.description: Quebec's modernized privacy law (Bill 64) for protection of personal information in the private sector.
plugins.longDescription: Quebec Law 25 (Bill 64) framework plugin provides comprehensive coverage of Quebec's Act respecting the protection of personal information in the private sector, as modernized in 2021. Includes privacy officer requirements, consent obligations, individual rights (access, rectification, portability, de-indexation), data breach notification (15-day requirement), cross-border transfer assessments, and automated decision-making transparency. Phased implementation from 2022-2024.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Privacy Officer
features.description: Privacy officer designation and governance requirements

features.name: Individual Rights
features.description: Access, rectification, portability, and de-indexation rights

features.name: Breach Notification
features.description: Privacy incident reporting and 15-day notification requirements

features.name: Auto-Import
features.description: Framework automatically imported on plugin installation

plugins.name: Texas Responsible AI Governance Act
plugins.description: Texas TRAIGA compliance framework for high-risk AI systems deployment and governance.
plugins.longDescription: Texas Responsible AI Governance Act (TRAIGA) framework plugin provides comprehensive coverage of Texas AI governance requirements for organizations deploying high-risk AI systems. Includes algorithmic impact assessments, bias testing, consumer disclosure requirements, human oversight obligations, appeal rights, risk management, and documentation requirements. Applicable to AI systems making consequential decisions in employment, education, financial services, healthcare, housing, and essential services.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Impact Assessments
features.description: Algorithmic impact assessments and bias testing

features.name: Consumer Rights
features.description: Disclosure, appeal, and opt-out requirements

features.name: Human Oversight
features.description: Human review and override requirements

features.name: Auto-Import
features.description: Framework automatically imported on plugin installation

plugins.name: Colorado Artificial Intelligence Act
plugins.description: Colorado AI Act compliance framework for preventing algorithmic discrimination in high-risk AI systems.
plugins.longDescription: Colorado Artificial Intelligence Act framework plugin provides comprehensive coverage of Colorado's AI governance requirements aimed at protecting consumers from algorithmic discrimination. Includes developer and deployer duties, algorithmic impact assessments, consumer notification and explanation rights, appeal processes, bias testing requirements, and risk management obligations. Applicable to AI systems making consequential decisions in education, employment, financial services, government, healthcare, housing, insurance, and legal services.
plugins.author: VerifyWise

features.name: Discrimination Prevention
features.description: Algorithmic discrimination testing and prevention

features.name: Consumer Rights
features.description: Disclosure, explanation, and appeal rights

features.name: Impact Assessments
features.description: Annual algorithmic impact assessment requirements

features.description: Framework automatically imported on plugin installation
